none: 群馬県倉賀野神社の算額 (現物)・Sangaku of Kuragano Shrine, Gunma (Original)

倉賀野神社様には、算額の撮影および掲載の許可を賜り、心より感謝申し上げます。 表示 - 非営利 4.0 国際： https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/deed.ja・We would like to thank  Kuragano Shrine for their kind permission to photograph the sangaku and post it in the archive.  CC BY-NC 4.0: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/
高崎市倉賀野町1263・1263 Kuraganocho, Takasaki City
鈴木右衛門勝森と門人・Suzuki Uemon Katsumori and his disciples
